actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the executive and legislative branches of the federal government should strive to enable the thousands of Cuban refugees to be ambassadors for freedom for the benefit of the Western Hemisphere.

summary.text: Calls upon the President to enlist the cooperation of other Western Hemisphere nations in the permanent resettlement of Cuban refugees. Expresses the sense of the House that Congress will provide the necessary funds and authority in this matter.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the executive and legislative branches of the federal government should strive to enable the thousands of Cuban refugees to be ambassadors for freedom for the benefit of the Western Hemisphere.
